## About Me

Dr. Samuel Blay Nguah is a pediatrician and medical statistician based in Kumasi, the second-largest
city in Ghana. He is a Senior Lecturer in the Department of Child Health of the School of Medicine
and Dentistry, Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology.

He has been a practicing consultant pediatrician at the Komfo Anokye Teaching Hospital since 2010
and as a doctor since 2000. He has a special interest in Paediatric Cardiology, caring for children
with congenital and acquired heart diseases since 2007.

As a medical statistician, he has actively participated in many surveys and research, with well over
50 publications in peer-reviewed medical journals. He is an ardent user of the R software for data
analysis and visualization. He frequently gives talks to resident doctors in training on topics,
including research methods and biostatistics.

His hobbies include reading, swimming, and gardening.
